        public void inflictStatusEffect(StatusEffectType type,
                       double secondsLasting,
                       Player inflicter,
                       StatusEffectListener listener)
        Inflict a status effect on the warlock. These can both be positive and negative.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of status effect, ie what attribute it targets
        secondsLasting -
        inflicter - the inflicting player
        listener - a expire listener that fires when the status effect expires
